doc.title: Insogno
doc.plot: A lonely man enters in his new empty house carrying a green plant. After a short sight around the house, he lays on a mattress on the floor. Now it's night, and the man is outside at the bus stop. He's waiting for the bus, when he see a woman in the bus stop at the other side of the street. She's smoking wearing sunglasses, a raincoat and a blonde wig. Suddendly a car distracts the man with a strong brake. In this moment the woman is disappeared. Was it all a dream? A cigarette butt seems to deny it.
